Text.Value: I just wanted to tell you there's a Zhentarim operation nearby.
More drow. Fist - at the ready!

EditorData.NodeContext: Ephren is kneeling next to her dead friend and jumps to her feet as she sees a potential enemy. She notes your presence, then calls out to her comrades. (Fist: at the ready!)
EditorData.logicalname: Lolth-sworn drow only, not Seldarine,  per Swen.

Text.Value: He of the Unsleeping Eyes. Grant me the might to carry this burden. Grant me the faith to face darkness without fear.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Ephren is kneeling next to the dead Jacek, praying
EditorData.CinematicObjects: Dead Jacek model with barbed arrow piercing his heart

Text.Value: No. We've suffered enough losses.

EditorData.NodeContext: Ephren is standing, but more relaxed now.

Text.Value: I am no monster - I mean no harm to you. Tell me what happened here.
You're... you're different than the others. I can tell.

EditorData.NodeContext: Ephren is standing, but more relaxed now.

Text.Value: He should never have been here in the first place. I'm the one that talked him into joining the Fist.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Ephren is kneeling next to the dead Jacek

Text.Value: Back, I say!

EditorData.NodeContext: Ephren is standing, helping to put out fire

Text.Value: Think carefully, colnbluth. Do you truly wish to anger Lolth's favoured?
Leave.
Let the prayer finish. The dead should be honoured as their oath commands.
TRY IT, WEAKLINGS.
Go on, try it.
Would that the arrow had pierced your heart instead.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Ephren is kneeling next to the dead Jacek

EditorData.stateContext: Ephren is standing up, but more relaxed now.

Text.Value: Speak to the Gauntlet. She'll tell you more.
Join the woman in prayer: 'Steel our blades...'
Please. Just leave me be.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Ephren is kneeling next to the dead Jacek

Text.Value: Looks like he wasn't cut out for this line of work.
Now please, just... leave me be.
My condolences to you.
Another Lolth-sworn - a killmonger, a monster. If I do not take her head, she will take mine.
Another Lolth-sworn - a killmonger, a monster. If I do not take his head, he will take mine.
Another Lolth-sworn - a killmonger, a monster.
May I ask what happened here?
Away, I tell you!

EditorData.stateContext: Ephren is standing up, ready to fight.

Text.Value: Cast Detect Thoughts.
It was a massacre. Drow and goblins slaughtered the lot. My poor Jacek never stood a chance.
What the hells happened here?

EditorData.stateContext: Ephren is standing up, but more relaxed now.

Text.Value: Get back.

EditorData.NodeContext: Ephren is standing, helping to put out the fire

Text.Value: Only a coward would speak ill of the fallen.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Ephren is kneeling next to the dead Jacek

Text.Value: Attack.
... and temper our hearts for the battles in this life and next.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Ephren is kneeling next to the dead Jacek and continues to pray

Text.Value: That's all I know. Please, just... leave me be.
Be at ease. I didn't come seeking battle.
Save your breath.
I promise my shield and my sword, Vigilant One. Let them be my courage...

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Ephren is kneeling next to the dead Jacek, praying

Text.Value: To die for a cause is noble, but still tragic. I'm sorry.
I'll note your concern. I'd do more, were we not so slight in number.
A massacre. Drow and goblins slaughtered the lot.
Whisper a sympathetic prayer.
Just go.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Ephren is kneeling next to the dead Jacek

Text.Value: Now please, just... leave me be. Speak to the Gauntlet if you want to know more.
You should know there are Zhentarim in the area.
More drow. Fist - at the ready!

EditorData.NodeContext: Ephren is standing, and ready to fight. She notes your presence, then calls out to her comrades. (Fist: at the ready!)
EditorData.logicalname: Lolth-sworn drow only, not Seldarine,  per Swen.

Text.Value: Looks like he wasn't cut out to be a Flaming Fist.
What the hells happened here?
Leave.
What are you... you'll pay for that!
Away from me.
Yet another dies for a futile cause. I'm sorry.
Steel our blades and temper our hearts for the battles in this life and next.

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Ephren is kneeling next to the dead Jacek and continues to pray

Text.Value: He is at rest now.

Synopsis:
Flaming Fist praying over a dead colleague. Jacek = "YAHT-sick."

Drow players: Ephren believes you are another attacker, and either initiates attack or you persuade her not to.
